Erie.Ravine Flyer III:
Ravine Flyer III is a junior steel roller coaster that is located at Waldameer Park in Erie, Pennsylvania, United States. The Ravine Flyer III was installed in the park 8 years before Ravine Flyer II.


== The Trains ==
The Ravine Flyer III has 1 train with 6 cars which seat 2 riders each for a total of 12 at once.
